==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|じ|てん|yomi=o}}

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|じてん|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK,DJR,SMK5|y=go}}
* {{homophone|字典|事典|sort=してん'|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|じてん|kyu=辭典}}

# a [[dictionary]]

====Usage notes====
{{wikipedia|Japanese dictionary}}
* Japanese has a number of words that are translated in English as “dictionary”; see [[w:Japanese dictionary|Japanese dictionary]] at Wikipedia.
* {{lang|ja|辞典}} is used (along with {{ja-r|辞書|じしょ}}) to mean “dictionary” in the English sense of “lexicon”, as well as more broadly to mean other word books such as
*: {{ja-r|類語辞典|るいごじてん}}: thesaurus and
*: {{ja-r|文法辞典|ぶんぽうじてん}}: grammar book, among others.

{{bottom}}
